front.title: MPLS Network Actions for Transporting In Situ Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (IOAM) Data Fields and Direct Exporting

abstract.t: In Situ Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (IOAM) is used for recording and collecting operational and telemetry information while the packet traverses a path between two points in the network. This document defines MPLS Network Actions for transporting IOAM data fields and direct exporting them.
